message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $20,000.
Hi Alice,  $20,000 is way above my budget. I'm really interested in the product but I can only go as high as $12,000.  Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $20,000 represents the true value of this product, I'm willing to come down to $17,000.  This is a significant reduction and I believe it's a fair offer.
Alice,  $17,000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm really determined to get this product, so I'm willing to go up to $14,000. This is my final offer.  Let me know if you're interested.
